page.title: 14Health
page.content: {Primary Health Care:}There is no resident General Practitioner or Community Nurse in Ashington. Health care is provided by two practices in Storrington (4 miles distant). There is a surgery in Ashington, to which both Storrington practices have access, the premises being provided by the Ashington Community Centre. {Pharmacy:}There is no pharmacist in Ashington. Prescriptions have to be taken to Storrington or Steyning (6 miles). Patients may also leave them at the Corner Stores (grocery & store) who arrange for them to be made up. {Hospital Services:}These are at Worthing and Southlands (10 and 13 miles respectively).Maternity services are provided at Southlands with a baby clinic at the Methodist Church Hall. {Dental Services:}One dental practice in Ashington and two in Storrington.
